example: 4-color ice- cream .
example_meaning: 4 màu kem .
definition: The butterfat/milkfat part of milk which rises to the top; this part when separated from the remainder.

example: It is hard for a baby chick to hatch out of that tough eggshell .
example_meaning: Là điều khó khăn cho một con gà con để chui ra khỏi cái vỏ trứng cứng.
definition: The shell around an egg.

example: Then by a curious coincidence, the camera died, due to the frost .
example_meaning: Rồi bằng một sự trùng hợp lạ lùng, camera bị tắt, vì sương giá .
definition: A cover of minute ice crystals on objects that are exposed to the air. Some of these are tree branches, plant stems, leaves, wires, poles, vehicles, rooftops, or aircraft skin. Frost is the same process by which dew is formed except that the temperature of the frosted object is below freezing. Frost can be light or heavy.

example: The Ghosts , they're about to knocking over the armored cars.
example_meaning: Bọn Bóng Ma , chúng chuẩn bị cướp chiếc xe bọc thép.
definition: (obsolete) The spirit; the soul of man.

example: Tickseed Fabaceae "Species Achalarus lyciades - Hoary Edge".

definition: (zoology) of a pale silvery gray.

example: It was as though I were leading the search for the hidden treasure of precious ivory .
example_meaning: Thể như tôi đang dẫn đầu cuộc đi tìm kho tàng ngà voi đã được giấu kín.
definition: (uncountable) The hard white form of dentine which forms the tusks of elephants, walruses and other animals.

example: Aren't you just as pretty as a magnolia in May?

definition: Of a creamy white colour, like that of some magnolia flowers.

definition: (countable) A breed of Spanish sheep that has long, fine hair

example: Other emissions from fossil fuel power station include sulfur dioxide, carbon monoxide (CO), hydrocarbons, volatile organic compounds (VOC), mercury, arsenic , lead, cadmium, and other heavy metals including traces of uranium.
example_meaning: Các phát thải khác từ nhà máy điện nhiên liệu hoá thạch bao gồm sulfur dioxide, carbon monoxide (CO), hydrocacbon, hợp chất hữu cơ dễ bay hơi (VOC), mercury, asen , chì, cadmium và kim loại nặng khác bao gồm dấu vết uranium.
definition: A nonmetallic chemical element (symbol As) with an atomic number of 33.

example: We're on our way to see the great ash tree.
example_meaning: Chúng tôi đang trên đường tới cây tần bì lớn.
definition: The solid remains of a fire.

example: The solution for that is to make roads out of porous asphalt .
example_meaning: Giải pháp cho vấn đề là làm những con đường từ nhựa đường xốp.
definition: A sticky, black and highly viscous liquid or semi-solid, composed almost entirely of bitumen, that is present in most crude petroleums and in some natural deposits.

example: The one-story houses in Capernaum were constructed from uncut local basalt (volcanic rock).
example_meaning: Nhà một tầng ở thành phố Ca-bê-na-um được làm bằng đá bazan nguyên ( đá núi lửa) có sẵn ở địa phương.
definition: (mineralogy) A hard rock of varied mineral content; volcanic in origin, it makes up much of the Earth's crust.

example: She has two cats. One is white and the other one is black .
example_meaning: Cô ấy có hai con mèo. Một con thì trắng và con kia thì đen .

example_meaning: Ăn mỳ nhé!
definition: A bean plant with black seeds.
small cup of strong black coffee without milk or cream

definition: To affix with cement.

example: Set here the charcoal pencil size used to simulate the drawing
example_meaning: Ở đây hãy đặt kích cỡ của bút chì than gỗ được dùng để mô phỏng bản vẽ

definition: slightly purplish or bluish dark grey

example: Some of them were dolphin liver. Some of them were dolphin blubber.
example_meaning: Một số là gan cá heo . Một vài mẫu là mỡ cá heo .

example: Each ovary is about the size and shape of an almond .

example_meaning: Khoai luộc ...

definition: (countable, uncountable) The exterior covering of the trunk and branches of a tree; the rind.

example: I mean, she chose her beaver , over her children.

definition: warm brownish-red colour similar to that of red clay bricks.

example: He's got four white socks, he's brown all over and he has a white mark here like so
example_meaning: Nó có bốn đốm trắng, toàn thân màu nâu , và có một vết trắng ở đây.
